attributes.action: To be able to send our children to school with their own beaker and juice
attributes.background: Recently the school have decided that only healthy snacks and water are allowed in school. Healthy snacks totally in agreement but the majority of children do not drink plain water which is cause for concern, 6 hours without a drink. Cordial is a healthy option and children need fluids!!

rejection.details: This decision is the responsibility of the school, not the Government or Parliament. You could raise this with the school's senior management and/or the governing body.
